select-by-config.name: config.c42048a_type
select-by-config.caption: LCD - Atmel YMCC42048AAAYDCL
select-by-config.info:
Driver for Atmel YMCC42048AAAYDCL LCD component (custom LCD used e.g. for XMEGA-B1 Xplained and STK600_RC064X_LCDX). Provides functions for initialization and control of the LCD segments.
'full_matrix0' uses the full LCD matrix (For the XMEGA-B1 Xplained board). 'partial_matrix0' uses part of the LCD matrix (For the STK600_RC064X_LCDX board).

module.caption: LCD - Atmel YMCC42048AAAYDCL Full Matrix
module.info: Driver for Atmel YMCC42048AAAYDCL LCD component (custom LCD used e.g. for XMEGA-B1 Xplained). This version called 'full_matrix0' uses the full LCD matrix. Provides functions for initialization and control of the LCD segments.

module.caption: LCD - Atmel YMCC42048AAAYDCL Custom Matrix V1
module.info: Driver for Atmel YMCC42048AAAYDCL LCD component (custom LCD used e.g. for STK600_RC064X_LCDX). This version called 'partial_matrix0' uses part of the LCD matrix. Provides functions for initialization and control of the LCD segments.
